p: A 10 mg/ml solution of the matrix α‐cyano‐4‐hydroxycinnamic acid (CHCA, Nacalai Tesque) was suspended in 6 ml of acetonitrile/water/trifluoroacetic acid (50/49.9/0.1 v/v) and sprayed on the perilla herb tissue sections on the ITO‐coated glass slides (Bruker Daltonics) using an automated pneumatic sprayer (TM‐Sprayer, HTX Tech). Ten passes were sprayed using the following conditions: flow rate, 120 µl/min; air flow, 10 psi; nozzle speed, and 1,100 mm/min.
